plot outline: Vedanth is in love with Jahnavi. On a date on the latter's birthday, the duo realise Jahnavi has lost her chain. Both come from modest backgrounds with not enough money in their hands and what follows is a chaotic mission to replace the chain. Will they be successful?
title: Sarvajanikarige Suvarnavakasha
plot: Attempting to keep up a promise with his girlfriend, Vedu teams up with his best friend and gets into some dubious schemes to make some quick money.

Vedanth is in love with Jahnavi. On a date on the latter's birthday, the duo realise Jahnavi has lost her chain. Both come from modest backgrounds with not enough money in their hands and what follows is a chaotic mission to replace the chain. Will they be successful?::anonymous
